channel.title: CVE Feed for Libnsgif -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Libnsgif -- all products

item.title: CVE-2015-7506|2024-08-06T07:51:28.198Z -- libnsgif -- libnsgif
item.description: The gif_next_LZW function in libnsgif.c in Libnsgif 0.1.2 allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read and application crash) via a crafted LZW stream in a GIF file.
